title: Bug 115960: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
description: When retrieving datetime values from a table, the format displayed in a dynamic text item differs from the format displayed in a data/text item.
OB: When inserting a new Date() as the content for all three items (text, data, dynamic text) and saving and previewing, the expected result is that all three items should display the same format for the datetime value.
EB: However, the actual result is that the data and text items display the datetime value in the expected format, while the dynamic text item displays the datetime value in a different format.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Insert a text item.
2. Insert a data item.
3. Insert a dynamic text item.
